com.amplifyframework.predictions

Interface PredictionsCategoryBehavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AWSPredictionsPlugin, PredictionsCategory, PredictionsPlugin, TensorFlowPredictionsPlugin

    public interface PredictionsCategoryBehavior
    The Predictions category includes functionality to convert and translate text, perform text analysis, and detect features in an image, using Machine Learning.

    • Method Summary
